activities: Customer data and Content that Logicalis processes on Customer’s behalf may be transferred to, and stored and processed in, the United States or any EU country in which Logicalis or its Affiliates or subcontractors maintain facilities. Customers appoint Logicalis to perform any such transfer of Customer data and Content to any such country as set forth above and to store and process Customer data and Content in order to provide the Services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data is any indentifiable information/data which manual or automatically processed  in collection, recorded, stored for organization, client, or customers
recoursemech: onlineBBB and EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)
